articles.author: Rappler.com
articles.title: No link found so far between menstrual disorders and COVID-19 vaccines, EU says - Rappler
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency says its safety committee had studied cases of menstrual disorders reported after vaccination, adding it had requested more data from vaccine developers to assess the issue
articles.content: Separately, the EMA on Friday recommended that immune thrombocytopenia, or low blood platelets, dizziness, and tinnitus, or ringing in the ear, be added to the labels of J&J's single-shot vaccine… [+31 chars]
